programme.title: Live: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 3 Bruins (3-0) and No. 11 Tar Heels (2-0) clash in the WBCA Challenge from Las Vegas. The last meeting took place in 2018 in St. Thomas on the U.S. Virgin Islands, an 83-49 North Carolina victory. UCLA dumped No. 6 Oklahoma 73-59 on Nov. 10.

programme.title: Christmas on Call
programme.desc: The lives of First Responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: After a snowstorm prevents all the presents from being delivered to base, two rival marines must team up for a special mission to save Christmas.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas at the Golden Dragon
programme.desc: When Romy and Rick's parents surprise them with news that they'll be closing their decades-old Chinese restaurant, the siblings soon find themselves reevaluating their futures.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: Angela, an American tour guide in Rome, agrees to teach a culture-shocked businessman named Oliver about the heart of Rome at Christmas.

programme.title: Holiday Road
programme.desc: Stranded at an airport, a group of holiday travelers agrees to rent a van for a road trip to Denver. When their unexpected journey leads them into uncharted territory, they must navigate a series of misadventures that brings them closer together.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: A series of mishaps disturbs the plans of a recently divorced mom (Anne Heche) for her two kids on their first Christmas without dad.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: The charitable Ella heads out on a boat in 1905 and ends up in 2025. Nick has to figure out how to get her back in time and decide if their newfound love can stand the test of it.

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: A trio of reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues, only to find unexpected joy, romance, and family bonds along the journey.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.

programme.title: #Xmas
programme.desc: When interior designer Jen is selected for a social media competition for a design brand, she poses as an influencer with her best friend playing her husband and her nephew as her baby.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rich man falls back in love with Christmas and a party planner.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers with a disdain for Christmas make a holiday pact to pretend to be a couple to ease their holiday complications. As they spend more time together, the phony couple begin to experience the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Darcy returns to her hometown for Christmas, and she reconnects with Luke, a former rival, they must plan a charity event together. As she spends time with her family and Luke, she starts to realize what matters most in life.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Deck the Halls on Cherry Lane
programme.desc: Three generations of neighbors on Cherry Lane experience life-changing Christmases, from a mistaken address leading to a live TV special, to a family facing their last holiday together, to best friends discovering unexpected love.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Once Upon a Holiday
programme.desc: When a royal princess runs away from her official obligations and duties, she starts to fall in love with a good Samaritan who is unaware of her real identity.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Operation Christmas
programme.desc: A single mother is determined not to let her boyfriend's deployment ruin her Christmas. She and her children decide to give back to other struggling military families on base.

programme.title: Christmas Homecoming
programme.desc: A military widow whose faith in Christmas has lapsed rents an apartment to a soldier who is recovering from an injury in battle. When they team up to save the town's military museum, these two wounded birds find themselves falling in love.

programme.title: Ghosts of Christmas Always
programme.desc: Katherine, a Ghost of Christmas Present, must help one soul rediscover his Christmas spirit, but this year has something unusual in store.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: As Michelle's wedding approaches, Hannah steps up to finish the new Evergreen museum's launch while questioning her future with Elliot.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer reconnects with a childhood friend while seeking the identity of the person who grants Christmas wishes placed upon an angel tree.

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when Mitch, her long time crush, moves back to town. When she learns Mitch's love for Christmas has drastically changed, she tries to bring his holiday spirit back by showing him the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: A Reason for the Season
programme.desc: In order to earn her trust fund and with the help of a handsome local attorney, Evie is tasked with granting Christmas wishes to the people who saved her life on the night of her birth.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Reunited at Christmas
programme.desc: As a child, Samantha spent every Christmas at her beloved Nana's house building the traditions of fun and joy with her family. Sam is facing the first Christmas without Nana and still struggling to find the Christmas spirit when she gets a surprise.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders: Death of a Humbug
programme.desc: The murder of the town Scrooge leads Emily and other shopkeepers to "A Christmas Carol"-themed scavenger hunt orchestrated by the victim.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Hitched for the Holidays
programme.desc: A man (Joey Lawrence) and a woman (Emily Hampshire) pose as a couple to fool their respective families.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: The Christmas Shepherd
programme.desc: Sally is heartbroken when her dog runs away during a thunderstorm. When she learns he was found by Mark, a widower, she travels to Boston to get him. Sally and Mark are given the best Christmas gifts of their lives when they fall in love.

programme.title: Northpole
programme.desc: When the power supply to Santa's city is threatened by a lack of holiday spirit, a youngster tries to help his busy mother rediscover the joys of the holiday season.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A former tour guide meets a busy single father on a Graceland tour and agrees to be his temporary nanny for the holidays.

programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas
programme.desc: Anne seems to have it all as a driven toy buyer in New York City, but her father's retirement signaling the closing of the town's beloved toy store brings the city girl back to her small-town roots.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: A Cheerful Christmas
programme.desc: Lauren and her best friend Colleen have landed their dream jobs - giving people the best and most magical Christmas ever.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A young woman grows panicky when she is haunted by a strange double who keeps appearing in a bus depot.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A six-year-old boy holds a town in terror with his powers to change or destroy anyone or anything at will.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Apparently benign alien emissaries show mankind how to end the misery of war, plague and famine.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: The Monsters Are Due on Maple Street
programme.desc: A mysterious power failure causes paranoid suburban residents to suspect one another of being disguised creatures from outer space.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man recovering from a nervous breakdown sees a horrifying creature on the wing of his plane. With William Shatner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman's natural beauty makes her a freak in a futuristic society.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman battles two miniature aliens from another planet in a battle of size vs. scientific weapons. With Agnes Moorehead.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up
programme.desc: On the night of a UFO sighting, seven people at a diner claim to be of Earth, though one of them is not.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Unique circumstances allow a meek bank teller to indulge his passion for reading. With Burgess Meredith.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man's ambition to be the best pool shark on Chicago's Randolph Street carries a high cost. With Jonathan Winters, Jack Klugman.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: Five Characters in Search of an Exit
programme.desc: Five people - a ballet dancer, a major, a clown, a tramp and a bagpipe player - trapped in a featureless enclosure with no idea how they got there attempt to escape.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vindictive doll takes revenge on a man who wants it destroyed. With Telly Savalas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An amnesiac (Earl Holliman) in an empty town feels he is being watched.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Marsha White goes to a department store to buy a gold thimble.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: The Four of Us Are Dying
programme.desc: Arch Hammer can change his face to look exactly like someone else, a talent that he depends on for a living.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Earth falls out of its orbit and starts moving toward the sun.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A small-time hoodlum gets killed by the police during a robbery and finds an afterlife where he can have anything he wants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist becomes convinced that his dummy has a will and a life of its own.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A timid man (Burgess Meredith) acquires superhuman strength; with Don Rickles.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An old radio picks up signals from the past that unexpectedly rejuvenate a pair of elderly lovers.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Two men try to make their fortune at Las Vegas from the power one of them has to move inanimate objects.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A book about thought gives a clerk the power to accomplish anything just by willing it, leaving him free to create an ideal world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An airline official tests his theory that a newly arrived but totally empty plane is imaginary-with startling results.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An insufferable cowboy star comes face to face with the real Jesse James.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A strange piano allows the listener's hidden character to be suddenly revealed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Unable to afford a personality transplant for both himself and his wife, a pain-wracked old man has his mind placed in a new youthful body at his wife's insistence.

programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na... (LIVE).

programme.title: ATP Uncovered
programme.desc: Teniseri su gotovo celu godinu na putovanjima. Saznajte nešto više o tome kako izgleda njihov život na terenu i van njega i kako organizatori ATP turnira rešavaju slatke i gorke muke koje imaju.

programme.title: Snooker (Leicester): Champion of Champions
programme.desc: Champion of Champions je profesionalni nerangirni snuker turnir koji se, sa prekidima, održava od 1978. godine. Na turniru učestvuju pobednici svih turnira pod otkriljem World Snooker-a u proteklih...

programme.title: Snooker (Leicester): Champion of Champions: Champion of Champions
programme.desc: Champion of Champions je profesionalni nerangirni snuker turnir koji se, sa prekidima, održava od 1978. godine. Na turniru učestvuju pobednici svih turnira pod otkriljem World Snooker-a u proteklih...

programme.title: Premier League (Ž) - Pregled
programme.desc: Premijer liga u fudbalu za žene igra se od 2011. godine. Pratite pregled nedavno završenog kola i saznajte ko je opravdao ulogu favorita, a ko je zahvaljujući odličnoj igri napravio veliko...

programme.title: FIM MotoMini World Series: GP World Final
programme.desc: (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Chemnitz - Budućnost
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga: Slepsk - Olsztyn
programme.desc: Pratimo mečeve najvišeg ranga odbojkaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj! Ova liga je svrstana među najbolje odbojkaške lige u Evropi, a u njoj se za svoje mesto bore najbolji klubovi te zemlje.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP: Azerbaijan - Iceland
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo u Kataru i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fast Zone
programme.desc: U ovoj emisiji, videćemo šta se dešava na serijama koje ne prenosi Sport Klub. I ovde ima kvalitetnih i ambicioznih vozača koji žele da se probiju u sam vrh.

programme.title: SK Momenti
programme.desc: Suze, znoj i smeh, sve je to sastavni deo sporta. A najbolji sport je uvek bio i uvek će biti na najboljem klubu...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP: R. Ireland - Portugal
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo u Kataru i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): Mogilno - Radom
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP: France - Ukraine
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo u Kataru i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Dubai - Crvena zvezda
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: Kifissia - Olympiacos
programme.desc: Voli se fudbal u Grčkoj i svaki duel, pogotovo derbi, doživljava se sa mnogo strasti. Olimpijakos jeste favorit za titulu, ali AEK, PAOK i večiti rival Panatinaikos kucaju na vrata...

programme.title: Fudbal - Holandska liga: Utrecht - Ajax
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.title: Fudbal: Turska liga - Pregled
programme.desc: Pogledajte najbolje momente sa utakmica Turske lige, takmičenja osnovanog 1958. godine u kom je najviše titula osvajala ekipa Galatasaraja.

programme.title: Pregled Bundeslige
programme.desc: Uz sve ono što nam je Nemačka podarila kroz istoriju ponosno stoji i Bundesliga. Najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja osnovanog 1963. godine broji 18 ekipa koje svakog avgusta kreću u trku za popularnim...

programme.title: Pregled saudijske lige
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva saudijske fudbalske lige, najbolji golovi, potezi i analize.

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Kocaeli - Galatasaray
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Hapoel Jerusalem - Neptunas
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Eintracht - Mainz
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: SK Mix
programme.desc: Najbolji, najsmešniji, najčudniji, sve što ima veze sa superlativima videćete u ovom specijalnom kolažu. I verujte, neće vam biti dovoljno da ga odgledate samo jednom...

programme.title: Bundesliga Specijal: Best of October
programme.desc: Svakog meseca, Bundesliga šalje specijalnu emisiju o najboljim igračima, tehnologijama koje se koriste za prenose i trenerima koji donose razliku...

programme.title: Rukomet - Slovenačka liga (M): Celje - Krka
programme.desc: Na vašem TV-u možete pratiti utakmice najboljih rukometnih klubova najjače rukometne lige u Sloveniji. Prva rukometna liga Slovenije se igra od početka slovenske samostalnosti 1991. godine. (LIVE).

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta
programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: London - Panionios
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Saudijska liga: Neom - Nassr
programme.desc: Pratite Saudijsku profesionalnu ligu, najvišu fudbalsku ligu u ligaškom sistemu Saudijske Arabije. Osnovana je 1976. godine kao prva profesionalna fudbalska liga Kraljevine Saudijske Arabije.

programme.title: Pregled španske košarke
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva i klipove najboljih trenutaka iz Endese, najjače košarkaške lige Španije.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Chemnitz - Budućnost

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Ludogorets - Arda
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona.

programme.title: Fudbal - Norveška liga: Rosenborg - Valerenga
programme.desc: Prva liga Norveške je najviše fudbalsko ligaško takmičenje u Norveškoj.

programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.desc: Ove sezone, među popularnim zujalicama smo videli zanimljive trke, ali i dosta sudara. Nadajmo se da nas u Portimau očekuje samo ono prvo.
